title: Wine and Wellness - Homeopathic Vaccines
cleaned_text: from 7-8 pm Join us for a short discussion about what to expect this flu season as well as a list of frequently asked questions about the flu vaccine and homeopathic immunization. We will be offering a combination of homeopathic immune injections and hydrotherapy to optimize your immunity this flu season. Speaker: Dr. Michele Raithel, ND | | Dr. Michele Raithel is a naturopathic medical doctor who specializes in chronic and acute disease. Join us on October 19, 2010 at Revolutions Natural Medical Solutions to enjoy free organic wine and hors d'oeuvres. We will be giving away one FREE hydrotherapy treatment ($80 value), and one FREE Homeopathic Flu vaccine ($25 value). Where: 189 Blue Ravine Rd.
